thread.title: HELP REUNITE DAUGHTER WITH HER LONG LOST FATHER
thread.title_full: HELP REUNITE DAUGHTER WITH HER LONG LOST FATHER

author: farhan
title: HELP REUNITE DAUGHTER WITH HER LONG LOST FATHER
text:
HELP REUNITE DAUGHTER WITH HER LONG LOST FATHER   Thu, 16/02/2017 - 5:25pm 
Hi my name is julie binte othman. 
I'm hoping that you can help me. I'm looking for my father Othman bin Abdullah. He was living in singapore. 
I was born in Singapore on February 22nd 1974. My mother Theresa Juan Pereira. Advertisement 
I was born at Kandang Kerbau hospital. 
They were living at 70-E 1st block, 55 kallang estate singapore 1439. 
My father's race chinese dialect group hokkien. I am hoping someone in singapore would know where my father is. 
I haven't seen my father since i was about 7/8 
I was in the salvation army home before i was reunited with my mother in nz. 
I'm pleading for help please as I'm planning on coming to Singapore and any help on how to find him would be greatly appreciated. 
Julie A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
